extends java.lang.Object

      • fixQueryString

        public static java.lang.String fixQueryString(java.lang.String queryString)
        Some post processing of the query string to fix the query so that it will run. We only need to do this if we have price constraints.
        Parameters:
        queryString -
        Returns:
        Modified query string

      • getDatabaseMap

        public static org.apache.torque.map.DatabaseMap getDatabaseMap(java.lang.String name)
                                                        throws org.apache.torque.TorqueException
        Returns the database map information for a given database.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the database corresponding to the DatabaseMap to retrieve, or null for the default database.
        Returns:
        The named DatabaseMap, not null.
        Throws:
        org.apache.torque.TorqueException - if Torque is not initialized and name is null.

      • getStringDelimiter

        public static char getStringDelimiter()
        Returns the character used to indicate the beginning and end of a piece of text used in a SQL statement (generally a single quote).
        Returns:
        The text delimeter.

      • beginTransaction

        public static java.sql.Connection beginTransaction(java.lang.String dbName)
                                            throws org.apache.torque.TorqueException,
                                                   java.sql.SQLException
        Get a Connection to the database for starting a transaction - defaulting to auto commit being OFF
        Parameters:
        dbName - database name
        Returns:
        a Connection to the database for starting a transaction - with auto commit set to false
        Throws:
        org.apache.torque.TorqueException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • beginTransaction

        public static java.sql.Connection beginTransaction(java.lang.String dbName,
                                   boolean autoCommit)
                                            throws org.apache.torque.TorqueException,
                                                   java.sql.SQLException
        Get a Connection to the database for starting a transaction
        Parameters:
        dbName - database name
        autoCommit - true for auto commit
        Returns:
        a Connection to the database for starting a transaction
        Throws:
        org.apache.torque.TorqueException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • addAdapters

      • getDB

        public static org.apache.torque.adapter.Adapter getDB(java.lang.String name)
                                               throws org.apache.torque.TorqueException
        Deprecated. use getAdapter(String) instead. This method will be removed in a future version of Torque.
        Returns the database adapter for a specific database name.
        Parameters:
        name - the database name, or null for the default db.
        Returns:
        The corresponding database adapter.
        Throws:
        org.apache.torque.TorqueException - Any exceptions caught during processing will be re-thrown wrapped into a TorqueException.

      • getAdapter

        public static org.apache.torque.adapter.Adapter getAdapter(java.lang.String name)
                                                    throws org.apache.torque.TorqueException
        Returns the database adapter for a specific database name.
        Parameters:
        name - the database name, or null for the default db.
        Returns:
        The corresponding database adapter, or null if no database adapter is defined for the given database.
        Throws:
        org.apache.torque.TorqueException - Any exceptions caught during processing will be rethrown wrapped into a TorqueException.

      • getTableDotColumn

        public static java.lang.String getTableDotColumn(org.apache.torque.map.ColumnMap colMap)
        Get tableName + "." + columnName from the ColumnMap
        Parameters:
        colMap - the ColumnMap
        Returns:
        tableName + "." + columnName
